pageTitle: Automate Processes with a CRM System
description: Using a CRM system to create and automate specific processes for your business is absolutely necessary to maximize your productivity and profitability.  When you spend less time on operational activities, you can dedicate more time with clients increasing both client satisfaction and profitability.

resourceStepList.title: Evaluate Your Options
resourceStepList.description: There are many solutions and technologies available with a wide array of features and functionality. Many CRM systems today feature account management, activity management, robust reporting and much more. Cetera Financial Group's guide to CRM Systems within Pentameter, our award winning practice management platform, helps advisors understand their CRM needs as well as assists in determining the right deployment options, flexibility, cost, efficiency and business value.

resourceItems.description: Read: Creating Growth Through Optimal Use of a CRM System
